name: Counterpunch

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 18, Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike, Weapon Focus (unarmed strike); base attack bonus +16 or brawler level 12th.

sections.text: Once per round, when you are fighting unarmed with both hands free and an opponent misses you with a melee attack, the opponent provokes an attack of opportunity from you. You must use an unarmed strike for this attack of opportunity.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: Dex 18, Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike, Weapon Focus (unarmed strike)
base attack bonus +16 or brawler level 12th
description: With deft reflexes, you capitalize on opponents' mistakes.
